function_call.name: eval_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":["Spread of 2019-ncov virus leading to global spread","Rapid conversion of public venues into healthcare facilities","Dramatic changes in public and private life due to covid-19","Risk of increased infection in houses with several occupants","Reliance on internet-based technologies for data collection","Heterogeneous access to ugs limiting benefits and exacerbating pandemic impact","Perception of urban green spaces shifted during the covid-19 pandemic","Visitors’ tendency to wander through the space rather than staying in one place during the confinement may result in increased interactions and overlapping of individuals, elevating disease transmission risk","Online surveys may create a methodological bias by excluding individuals with limited internet access and computer skills","Decrease in in-person surveys during the confinement may lead to a loss of data from individuals who are unable to participate in online surveys","Changes in respondents’ occupations and demographic characteristics during the confinement period may impact the comparability of survey data before and during the confinement","High mobility rates in highly populated districts with low ugs densities","Positive correlation between mdp and covid-19 cases","Low ugs density per person","Inadequate social distancing in ugs","Potential spread of covid-19 due to group analysis and data collection","Use of f test and statistical analysis may not account for the impact of the pandemic on survey responses","Collection of data from iphone users without explicit consent","Multinomial logistic regression model developed due to violation of proportional odds assumption in ordinal regression model","Increased reliance on iot for monitoring and tracking of infected individuals can lead to data accuracy and reliability issues","Overreliance on iot technology may lead to a lack of human judgment and intervention in critical healthcare decisions","Lack of research on pandemic governance","People not following covid-19 protocols such as maintaining six feet distance and other health protocols","Congestion and lack of social distancing in urban spaces and social gathering areas","Failure of measures due to lack of consideration for cultural beliefs and practices","Evolution of crisis leading to uncertain conclusions","Horizontal expansion and decentralization can lead to increased transmission of contagious diseases due to greater connectivity between different areas","Differences in income and class can lead to unequal access to safe public spaces and increased vulnerability to contagious diseases","High-density districts and crowded urban areas can lead to higher morbidity rates of covid-19 and increased vulnerability among older people and men","Decreased immunity due to physical inactivity and social distancing measures","Inadequate management of multi-functional public spaces leading to increased risk of virus transmission","Overcrowding due to concentration of amenities leading to increased risk of virus transmission","Urban spaces not designed for pandemic mitigation norms and regulations","Questioning the effectiveness of 6 feet physical distancing in urban spaces","Inflexible layout design may lead to inadequate access to daylight and natural light, impacting the overall health and well-being of occupants","Insufficient separation of wet and living spaces may lead to increased risk of cross-contamination and spread of pathogens","Lack of greenery near living and working areas may impact mental well-being and stress levels of occupants","Limited access to green spaces in living areas","Inadequate ventilation and fresh air supply in unit apartments","Congestion of activities in the house due to lockdown regulations may lead to a reduction in privacy for family members, impacting mental health and well-being","Inadequate access to daylight and natural light","Lack of application of biophilic design principles","Inadequate utilization of technology for mitigating the spread of contagious diseases","Cybersecurity risk due to accelerated digital transformation","Rapidly modified healthcare facilities may lead to increased risk of cross-contamination and spread of diseases","Increased power consumption after lockdown may lead to higher pollution levels and environmental health risks","Failure to follow established protocols and safety procedures by healthcare workers","Frequent consumption of alcohol could potentially increase the health problems","Thermal scanners are not an effective method for diagnosis of covid-19, as it can only detect fever and infected individuals may not have fever yet"]}
